quote: This is pity,‚Äù he thought, and then he lifted his head in wonder. He thought that there must be something terribly wrong with a world in which this monstrous feeling is called a virtue.
quote_letters: THIS IS PITY HE THOUGHT AND THEN HE LIFTED HIS HEAD IN WONDER HE THOUGHT THAT THERE MUST BE SOMETHING TERRIBLY WRONG WITH A WORLD IN WHICH THIS MONSTROUS FEELING IS CALLED A VIRTUE
